## useBoolean() function

Use a boolean value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useBoolean(initialValue?: boolean): UseBooleanResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  initialValue | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Initial boolean value, defaults to false. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[UseBooleanResult](./hooks.usebooleanresult.md)

A boolean value, and functions to update it.
